评论概述: Great tips and not too cropped
评论详情: If you’re like me, you rely heavily on reviews. For reference, I am 5’5” 160lbs. I orginally bought these in size large and they were just too tight for me. They are flattering, don’t ride up, and give you a waist without feeling like you’re gonna a show off tummy skin.

Love how comfy this top is. It’s the perfect length for my torso to where it’s not too cropped but also not too long. Love the ruched sides as well. Definitely a great layering tee as well. The ribbing is very minimal.

These are the perfect ribbed cropped tanks. Perfectly ribbing, perfect thickness, perfect  stretch, with the perfect neckline. I love how it’s slightly cinched in on the sides to create a flattering waist. The cropped length is cropped long enough to wear without fear of my belly button showing and long enough to tuck in without bunching, but also cropped enough to feel like it’s actually a cropped top, if that makes sense. I will absolutely be buying more colors!
